item.title: Survival Of Adriana Smith’s Baby Upsets Democrats, Media More Than Her Death
item.description: If reading about a black female in Georgia whose passing was exploited to attack pro-life protections sounds familiar, that’s because it is.

item.title: Democrats Will Turn Every Illegal Alien Trump Doesn’t Deport Into A Voter
item.description: Given the chance, Democrats will choose voter registration over deportation.

item.title: U.S. Attorney Chased By Illegal Alien With Knife In Albany
item.description: Criminal behavior is what we can expect from people who started their relationship with this country by entering illegally.
